summary: Completed full Encore MCP server setup: installed Encore CLI v1.52.1, created Encore app 'encore-test-app' with App ID 'kumza', updated MCP configuration in ~/.cursor/mcp.json with actual App ID, added Encore to PATH in ~/.bashrc, and created comprehensive documentation.
